img.alt: Kindergarten Screening, May 12th and May 13th, 2020.

div.p: If you have a child who will be 5 years old on or before December 1, 2020, please call 315-393-4264 extension 32915 to schedule an appointment for Kindergarten Screening. Students currently enrolled in the districts UPK program do not need to be screened on the scheduled days.

img.alt: Ogdensburg Free Academy/St. Mary’s Academy Athletic Hall of Fame Nomination 2020

a.span: Ogdensburg Free Academy/St. Mary’s Academy Athletic Hall of Fame Nomination 2020

div.p: This form is to be used to nominate a former athlete, coach/administrator, honorary member or team for induction into the Ogdensburg Free Academy/St. Mary’s Academy Athletic Hall of Fame. Please refer to the enclosed information sheet for details. Deadline for Nomination : June 30, 2019

a.title: Go to comments for Ogdensburg Free Academy/St. Mary’s Academy Athletic Hall of Fame Nomination 2020

img.alt: Lead Free Kids for a Healthy Future

div.p: The St. Lawrence County Department of Public Health kindly asks for your help in spreading lead poisoning awareness by completing our survey. Our county has recently received a grant that will provide funding over the next several years for lead poisoning education and, eventually, lead removal from the homes of income qualified families. To best serve our county and to provide the best lead education, we would greatly appreciate if you complete our brief survey on your knowledge and awareness of lead. Please click title to take survey.

a.title: Go to comments for Lead Testing

img.alt: All Star Lunch

div.p: Madill School held its 1st POSITIVITY PROJECT “All Star Lunch” on Oct. 30th. Senior Athletes, who attended Madill school as elementary students, went back to eat lunch in their Blue Devil jerseys. The Seniors signed “autographs” and spent time talking about the P2 character trait: TEAMWORK!

a.title: Go to comments for All Star Lunch

img.alt: "A Little Something Extra Donation

div.p: Deringer Inc., a customs brokerage, consulting and logistics firm, with operations here in Ogdensburg, recently made a very generous and sizable donation to "A Little Something Extra", our school run pantry. Thank You Deringer!

img.alt: Kindergarten Screening Update

div.p: Kindergarten Screening, originally scheduled for May 12th & 13th, has been postponed due to the extended school closure. We will schedule a new date during the summer months, with details to be shared as soon as we can safely return to our school buildings. If you have a child who will be five years old on or before December 1, 2020, please email Mrs. Brenno at sbrenno@ogdensburgk12.org to be included on our Kindergarten Screening list. Please provide your child's name, your name, and a phone number at which you can be reached to schedule a screening. Mrs. Brenno will respond to confirm your email has been received.

a.title: Go to comments for Kindergarten Screening Update
